results.deck: Atomic Planet was an English game developer that produced titles for various platforms.
results.description:
Atomic Planet developed games such as Aero the Acro-Bat, Beverly Hills Cop and Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo.

The company went into administration on the 25th of Febuary, 2009.
results.name: Atomic Planet Entertainment Limited

game.name: Bob the Builder: Festival of Fun

concept.name: Games on Which Movies are Based
